siteSubTitle: Make your own graph by entering an expression:

docs.cases: dataset for the total number of confirmed cases up to the given day
docs.deaths: dataset for the total number of deaths up to the given day
docs.newcases: dataset for the number of new cases on the given day
docs.newdeaths: dataset for the number of new deaths on the given day
docs.day: indicates you would like to access data for the current day on the slider
docs.first: indicates you would like to access data for the first day in the dataset
docs.last: indicates you would like to access data for the last day in the dataset
docs.sum: aggregate sum operation to be used over a range of data
docs.average: aggregate average operation to be used over a range of data
docs.max: aggregate max operation to be used over a range of data
docs.min: aggregate min operation to be used over a range of data

TotalCasesOnaDay.title: Total confirmed cases on a particular day

NewCasesOnaDay.title: New cases on a particular day

NewDeathsOnaDay.title: New deaths on a particular day

TotalDeathsOnaDay.title: Total deaths on a particular day

NewCasesOnaDayPer1M.title: New confirmed cases on a particular day per million people

NewDeathsOnaDayPer1M.title: New deaths on a particular day per million people

TotalCasesOnaDayPer1M.title: Total confirmed cases on a particular day per million people

TotalDeathsOnaDayPer1M.title: Total deaths on a particular day per million people

Last7DaysAverageCases.title: Average new cases in Last 7 Days

Last7DaysAverageDeaths.title: Average new deaths in Last 7 Days

Last30DaysAverageCases.title: Average new cases in last 30 days

Last30DaysAverageDeaths.title: Average new deaths in last 30 days

MaxNewCasesPerDaysoFar.title: Max new cases per day so far

MaxNewDeathsPerDaysoFar.title: Max new deaths per day so far

AverageDeathsPerDay.title: Average deaths per day over all time

MaxNewCasesinLast7Days.title: Max new cases in last 7 days

MaxNewCasesinLast30Days.title: Max new cases in last 30 days

MinNewCasesinLast7Days.title: Min new cases in last 7 days

MinNewCasesinLast30Days.title: Min new cases in last 30 days
